description: This file defines the Message entity class mapped to the chatbot_messages database table, including its fields, annotations, and lifecycle methods.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Entity class representing a chat message in the database with fields for id, conversation ID, role, message type, content, payload, timestamps, and lifecycle methods.

methods.name: prePersist
methods.description: Automatically initializes timestamp and ID fields before persisting the entity.
